personalInfo.name: Shashikant
personalInfo.description: I am a passionate developer creating innovative websites with modern web technologies. Specializing in PHP, Web Development and OOP concepts.

experience.desc: Developing a scalable internship platform using the MERN stack.

projects.title: BetterSty Main Website
projects.desc: Developed the official website for BetterSty, featuring a modern UI, seamless navigation, and optimized performance.
projects.fullDesc: BetterSty required a high-performance, visually appealing landing page to showcase their services. I engineered a solution focusing on Core Web Vitals, resulting in a 99% performance score. The site features smooth scroll animations, interactive service cards, and a fully responsive layout that works flawlessly across all devices.
features: High-performance landing page with 99+ Lighthouse score
Interactive service cards using Framer Motion

projects.title: BetterSty CRM
projects.desc: A comprehensive CRM system for managing leads, clients, and sales pipelines efficiently.
projects.fullDesc: This internal tool was built to streamline the sales process. It allows the sales team to track leads from initial contact to conversion. I implemented a complex dashboard with chart visualizations for sales data and a role-based access control system for different employee levels.

projects.title: Zepto Clone
projects.desc: A fully functional e-commerce grocery delivery app clone with real-time cart management.
projects.fullDesc: To master React Native, I built a pixel-perfect clone of the Zepto app. This project handles complex state management for the shopping cart and integrates with Firebase for real-time order status updates. It includes a mock payment gateway and address management system.
features: Google Maps integration for delivery address
Optimized list rendering for thousands of products

projects.title: StudyNotion EdTech
projects.desc: An educational platform where instructors can create courses and students can purchase them.
projects.fullDesc: StudyNotion is a massive EdTech platform I am currently building. It serves two user types: Instructors and Students. Instructors can upload course videos (handled by Cloudinary) and create content. Students can buy courses via Razorpay and track their progress. It's a full-fledged LMS.

projects.title: Blog Application
projects.desc: A dynamic blogging platform with rich text editing, comments, and user authentication.
projects.fullDesc: A content management system built from scratch. I implemented a rich-text editor for writing posts and a comment system for engagement. The backend uses MongoDB for flexible data storage, and the frontend is optimized with Next.js for SEO.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.desc: A sleek weather forecasting app using OpenWeatherMap API.
projects.fullDesc: A simple yet beautiful weather application that fetches real-time data based on user location or search. It demonstrates proficiency in handling 3rd party APIs, asynchronous JavaScript, and error handling for bad network conditions.
